channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Body of Guatemalan woman killed when she went to clean the wrong Indiana house is returned home
item.description: The body of María Florinda Ríos Pérez, a Guatemalan woman killed in Indiana, has been returned to her native country

item.title: Thousands of arrests by Trump's task force in Memphis strain crowded jail and courts
item.description: A task force ordered by President Donald Trump to combat crime in Memphis, Tennessee, has made thousands of arrests

item.title: Stores keep prices down in a tough year for turkeys. Other Thanksgiving foods may cost more
item.description: Bird flu and another disease have shrunk the U.S. turkey population to a 40-year low this year

item.title: The shutdown is over. Flights have resumed. Thanksgiving travelers might wonder: What now?
item.description: Travelers this Thanksgiving may still feel on edge after the historic government shutdown that caused widespread flight cancellations and delays

item.title: US signals broader efforts to protect Nigeria's Christians following Trump's military threat
item.description: President Donald Trump’s administration is promoting efforts to work with Nigeria’s government to counter violence against Christians
